meanings.definition: A person or machine that sorts items into categories.
meanings.sent1: The sorter quickly separated the different colored marbles.
meanings.sent2: The mail sorter organized the letters by destination.
meanings.sent3: The sorter at the recycling plant had a knack for finding treasures among the trash.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a sorter, neatly categorizing information as it came in.
meanings.sent5: The sorter hummed along, efficiently dividing the books by genre.

meanings.definition: A container used for sorting items.
meanings.sent1: She placed the screws in the sorter to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: The sorter had compartments for different types of beads.
meanings.sent3: The sorter overflowed with buttons, each one waiting for its turn to be used.
meanings.sent4: The sorter resembled a mini-library, with each section holding a different type of candy.
meanings.sent5: The sorter's trays were like tiny homes for each type of seed.

meanings.definition: A person who organizes or arranges things into groups.
meanings.sent1: As a sorter, she made sure all the files were in order.
meanings.sent2: The event planner was a skilled sorter of tasks and responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The sorter of the book club made sure everyone got a chance to pick the next read.
meanings.sent4: Her role as a sorter in the team was crucial for keeping things running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The sorter of the art supplies knew exactly where to find each color of paint.
